segments.text: Do you have any other questions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to know about fees .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You will be required to pay a small fee for every time you overdraft .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You'll have to pay $ 25 every time you overdraft .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It should stop you from overdrafting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You would think it would , but it most likely won ’ t .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I help you with anything else ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s it for today . Thank you .
segments.speaker: S2
